narratives:
Hi there partner, you only have enough money to start a small farm.
Why not we head over to the market and see what we can buy.
On your top right hand corner you can see the location you are at. Currently you are at your Wheatfarm.
On the bottom left hand corner of the screen, you can see the assets you hold. Currently you have 100 gold to start your farm.

The first command you will be using is a 'Do' command.
The 'Do' command instructs farmer John to carry out an action.
Enter [Do GoToMarket] to create a task that tells Farmer X to drive to the market.
From the example above, 'Do' is the type of task given and 'gotomarket' is the action to be carried by the farmer.
The type of tasks available and the action to be executed can be seen in the middle of the screen.
When you are ready to complete the objective, enter [Start] to execute the code.
You have arrived at the Market.
